doc.title: Wiase nyinaa nhyehyɛe ahorow
doc.checkedUseSetting: Hwɛ sɛ wobɛma nhyehyɛe yi atumi ayɛ adwuma.
doc.excludeDomains: Fa domain din a wɔbɛyi afiri mu ka ho.

example.domain: Wubetumi de domain din bi aka ho, te sɛ {{url}}, de ayi domain din no nyinaa afi mu.
example.url: Wubetumi ayi nkitahodi pɔtee bi afi mu denam nkitahodi bi a wode bɛka ho, te sɛ {{url}}.
example.glob: Wubetumi de {{glob}} nhwɛsode bi aka ho, te sɛ {{minimatch}}, ama fuzzy matching.

doc.script: Wubetumi nso de js scripts adi dwuma de anya control a ɛyɛ nwonwa kɛse.
doc.checkedUseScript: Sɛ́ ebia wobɛma wo script no ayɛ adwuma no, hyɛ no nsow sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wohyɛ nnaka abien no nyinaa agyirae bere koro mu na ama script no ayɛ adwuma.

example1.commentTitle: Mprempren wɔ {{youtube}} wɛbsaet no so no, ɛsɛ sɛ wubue {{youtube}} {{watch}} anaa {{shorts}} krataafa no wɔ tab foforo mu.
example1.introVariables: Nnianim asɛm a ɛfa nneɛma a ɛsakra ho
example1.page: : Nsakraeɛ no yɛ URL adeɛ a ɛwɔ wɛb krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no mu Yɛsrɛ wo hwɛ</a >
example1.pageHost: : Domain din a ɛwɔ wɛbsaet krataafa a ɛwɔ hɔ mprempren no so
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Domain din koro no ara Hyɛ no nsow sɛ ɛwom sɛ {{youtube}} ne {{abusua}} domain din titiriw no nyinaa yɛ {{mainDomain}} de, nanso subdomain din no yɛ {{youtubeSubDomain}} ne {{. familiesSubDomain}} sɛnea ɛte biara Enti wɔn domain din no yɛ soronko.
example1.click: : link a wɔde kliki so no
example1.clickpath: : Ɔkwan a link a wɔakliki no fa so
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} kwan a ɛne ne ho hyia, de {{minimatch}} nhomakorabea di dwuma, ɔkwan a wɔfa so de di dwuma Mesrɛ wo Hwɛ, anaa wobɛtumi ahwehwɛ sɛdeɛ wode {{glob}} bedi dwuma.
example1.rightTab: : Link no bebue wɔ tab foforo bi mu wɔ nifa so
example1.wholeCode: Nkyerɛaseɛ a ɛwɔ koodu no nyinaa mu ne sɛ mprempren ɛwɔ YouTube {{www}} domain din krataafa no so, sɛ link a wɔakliki no yɛ domain din koro na ɔkwan no fi ase wɔ {{watch}} anaa {{shorts}} a, ɛnde tab foforo no kratafa a ɛwɔ nifa so no bɛyɛ Open.
